summary: Small shack opposite of Honningbrew meadery, all the cool features from Elisdriel transferred here. Very compact but packed with stuff. For those of us who like tiny homes. Use this mod in tandem with Jaxonz positioner to take advantage of the empty storage and display space
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/AVFe6t7.png[/img]

[b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][/b][/color][/color][/b][center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________[/center]

[i]I made Elisdriel as much for my own char as for my buddies in Reddit, [/i]
[i]but it ended up being too much for me. I loved the features of it, so I took stuff from that mod and put it to this one.[/i]
[color=#93c47d][size=4]
• Hang your special bows on unique plaques
• Safely store away and display dragonpriest masks
• Use Jaxonz mods to customise and organise the house
• Make batches of powerful poison arrows instead of poisoning them in battle
• Reset crafted items to re-enchant and temper them
[/size][/color]
[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]:: FEATURES ::[/b][/size][/color]
• All vanilla workstations and storage for them
• Awesome clutter and some new shiny textures
• Cool looking custom storage
• Space for all your books
• Bed gives "Well Rested" / Spouse bonus
• Outhouse and small plantable garden
• Lots of display space, some free, some predetermined
• Spot for a horse, fast traveling moves horse to shed
• New plantables

[youtube]rhCxOGJ_M3g[/youtube][youtube]YjZAndxnBSE[/youtube]
[youtube]dmPxkL7R3oo[/youtube]

[b][color=#93c47d][size=4]:: GENERAL OTHER STUFF ::[/size][/color][/b]
• Cleaned and hand-polished with TES5Edit]
• House has day and night cycle, so it's darker at night
• Navmeshed for your friend's convenience
• OBVIOUSLY all storage is safe, set to no-respawn and the house is a no reset zone so nothing you place anywhere will reset

[b][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]Update 1.2: I got a few complaints that the house was too easy to get. Now you have to go find the previous owner in Helgen. They got into a bit of a... scaly situation.[/size][/color][/b]

[i][url=http://fi.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halla][b]Halla[/b] [/url]means "cold night", a situation where the temperature lowers during growth season (summer, early autumn) at ground level to below 0ºC (frost). If the temperature near ground level goes below -4 °C, it's called "harsh halla". During this situation the vegetation and crops will suffer greatly. I thought it was suitable because Pelagius is always complaining about "the nip in the air".[/i]

[b][color=#6aa84f][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/size][/color][/b]
• Skyrim up to date
• Dawnguard DLC
• Hearthfires DLC
• Dragonborn DLC

[size=3][color=#f1c232]These are not negotiable. I will NOT make a version without any of these.[/color]
[color=#f1c232]If you want a shack like this without any requirements, get the [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48618/?]Beginner's Shack[/url][color=#f1c232].[/color]

[/size][size=3][color=#f1c232]USE THIS MOD IN TANDEM WITH[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?] JAXONZ POSITIONER[/url][color=#f1c232] TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE FREE STORAGE SPACE LIKE SHELVES AND STATIC WEAPON PLAQUES![/color]

[color=#6aa84f][b]:: POISON ARROW CRAFTING ::[/b][/color]
The base for poisoned arrows are Hunter's Arrows. [color=#6aa84f]In the alchemy satchel by the alchemy lab is a satchel with a book.[/color][color=#6aa84f] 
[/color]Read the book to get "Secrets of Arrow craft" ability, equal to your character learning the recipes. Then you can craft the arrows in Elven section at the forge if you have the Elven perk.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]:: RECOMMENDED MODS ::[/b][/size]
[/color]- Static Mesh Improvement Mod -  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655
- Furniture and Clutter HD Texture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4571
- aMidianBorn Whiterun - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38491
- Skyrim Mod Combiner  

ENB in the screenshots is [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/?]Grim & Somber Vaermina ENB [/url][/b]

[b][color=#ffd966][size=4]:: KNOWN ISSUES & CONFLICTS ::

[b][b][color=#ff7700][size=5]NOT COMPATIBLE WITH THE ROOKERY, SICARIUS' REFUGE, ELI'S ARROW CRAFTING OR ELISDRIEL !! [/size]
[size=2]I make mods for myself. I don't install 15 house mods into one playthrough. I use one house mod at the time and I move the arrow crafting to the mod I use. The arrow crafting will conflict with any of my other mods that use that feature.[/size][/color][/b][/b]
[/size][/color][/b]
• I know there's another mod in this exact location. I made this mod for myself and I don't use any other house mods.
• The ladder to the attic is a bit of a pain due to small space,and not navmeshed because NPC's would have trouble with it.
[b]   Please do not comment about it, I can't do anything to fix it :P
[/b]
Do try to load these 2 mods as low as possible in your plugins list

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]:: FAQ ::
[/b][/size][/color]Q: THERE ARE EMPTY SHELVES EVERYWHERE!? 
A: I have discovered Jaxonz Positioner. I intend to use that to place all kinds of quest treasures all over the house.

Q: I don't like the way you set up the named storage.
A: Use [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?]Jaxonz Renamer[/url][/b] to change things around to your liking

[b][size=4][color=#93c47d]:: CREDITS ::[/color]
[/size][/b][i]Moved to Perms tab because the list was the length of a novel[/i]

[b][size=4][color=#93c47d]:: THANKS ::[/color]
[/size][/b]JadenDew for testing this a buncha times[/center]
author: Elianora
